name: Down The Rabbit's Dungeon
description:
* THIS GAME IS HIGHLY UNFINISHED *

The idea was that you would play as a girl who fell down a rabbit's hole and into a dungeon, but I never got  to put any of that into the game so nevermind...

Controls:

Movement: WASD, Arrow Keys

Confirm/ Menu: Z, H, Enter

Cancel: X, J, Esc
